item.title: Compile error look i have a pic
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

You’re really gonna make me read through it? I suppose so…I’ll edit it in when I find it.

Edit: There’s none missing, either you have some missing somewhere else, or I’m totally off base, but I normally get that error when I leave a } out, so maybe try adding one to the end of each of those 4 commands I think you got there and compiling, see if it helps, if not it’s either somewhere else, or I’m totally wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error look i have a pic
item.dc:creator: @Anti_Pizza Anti Pizza
item.description:
@Anti_Pizza wrote:

And this is the code that i added

if(command.startsWith("give admin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Nic")) {
            String name = command.substring(6);
            client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.sendMessage("Nic just made you admin !!!");
}

if(command.startsWith("give co-owner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Nic")) {
            String name = command.substring(6);
            client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.sendMessage("Nic just made you the co-owner!!!!");
}

if(command.startsWith("give mod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Nic")) {
            String name = command.substring(4);
            client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.sendMessage("Nic just made you mod !!!");
c.sendMessage("Nic just made you mod !!!");
c.sendMessage("Nic just made you mod !!!");
c.sendMessage("Nic just made you mod !!!");
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("alltome") && (playerRights >= 2)) //made by musicmad441
{
teleall(); //made by musicmad441
}
if (command.startsWith("pheal")&& playerRights >= 2){
   {
      try{
      String otherPName = command.substring(6);
      int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
      if(otherPIndex != -1)
         {
      client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
      int MaxHits = p.getLevelForXP(p.playerXP[p.playerHitpoints]);
         p.NewHP = MaxHits;
         p.playerLevel[3] = MaxHits;
         p.setSkillLevel(3, MaxHits, p.playerLevel[3]);
         p.playerGfx(436, 0);
         p.setAnimation(1500);
         p.updateRequired = true;
         p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
   }
         }
